5.0.0: Added: Compatibility for WordPress 4.7 and PHP 7.
5.0.1: Added: Option to replace imported CSV file value with static and dynamic value.
5.0.2: Added: Image image import from external URL

5.0.4: Added: Any Custom Post Type import.

5.0.7: Improved: High speed import with enhanced UI.

5.0.3.7: Fixed: Inline image support. ( Supports all external URL )

Enhancements.1: Introducing: Elementor templates bulk export (addon) and import feature in a single CSV file format. This allows you to back up your Elementor templates as an easily portable single CSV file.
Enhancements.2: Introducing: content import support for Posts, Pages, Custom Post Types (CPTs), and WooCommerce Products designed with Elementor, simplifying the content migration process for Elementor websites.

Bug Fixes.3: Fixed: 500 error issue when exporting STM-course with an empty date field.
Bug Fixes.4: Fixed: export file path URL issue (for customers without multi-site).
Bug Fixes.5: Fixed: attribute value assignment issue in variation import (when the same attribute value is present under different attribute names).
Bug Fixes.6: Fixed: NaN error issue while importing XML files (specific to MariaDB).
Bug Fixes.7: Changed: stock_qty to stock for WooCommerce product metadata (as WooCommerce uses stock instead of stock_qty).
Bug Fixes.8: Fixed: product export issue based on category (where the exported CSV was missing products).
Bug Fixes.9: Fixed: PHP custom function not working in WordPress custom fields widget issue.
Bug Fixes.10: Fixed: ACF field mapping custom function issue.
Bug Fixes.11: Fixed: issue with the filename not properly inserted during zip image upload (replaced spaces with hyphens).
Bug Fixes.12: Fixed: export data issues based on specific filters (to avoid exporting extra data).
Bug Fixes.13: Fixed: schedule import last run date issue (set to empty if frequency is not chosen to avoid invalid date).

Enhancements.1: Introducing: Media import UI feature improvements
Enhancements.2: Introducing: Log summary and failed image download option
Enhancements.3: CSV Export for Media Details: After importing media, users can now download a detailed CSV file. This CSV includes columns for status, media_id, media_url, file_name, title, caption, alt_text, and description.
Enhancements.4: CSV Export for Post Failed Image Details: After importing media, users can now download a detailed CSV file. This CSV includes columns for media_id, post_title, post_id, actual_url.
Enhancements.5: New Media Import Tab: Introduced a new tab dedicated to media import and update. This feature allows users to upload both local and external images directly.
Enhancements.6: Failed images in posts and media can be updated in the media section.
Enhancements.7: Added featured image metadata to the mapping section, including image_title, image_filename, image_alt_text, image_description, and image_caption.
Enhancements.8: Improved logging details for more comprehensive tracking of import and media processes.
Enhancements.9: Included post-import log details to display the count of images associated with the post and the count of any failed images.
Enhancements.10: Improved: Log Manager: Implemented a log manager where users can access and download summary logs, media logs, and failed media logs as CSV files.
Enhancements.11: Enabled the download of failed media logs and summary logs as CSV files.

Bug Fixes.12: Fixed: WooCommerce product attribute not importing (case: attribute name has special character like Taille de la chaîne) #18753

Enhancements.0: Added: WP_Query results export – Export dynamic content using WP_Query for posts, users, and comments.
Enhancements.1: Added: Preview option – View the first 10 records before full export.
Enhancements.2: Added: Support for BMP image format – Import and export BMP images to the WordPress media library.
Enhancements.3: Added: Font faces and font families – Import/export complete font groups including styles and weights.
Enhancements.4: Added: Global styles support – Transfer design presets like color schemes and typography across sites.
Enhancements.5: Added: Full templates import/export – Migrate complete page layouts or full templates in block themes.

Bug Fixes.0: Fixed: elementor_data support for custom posts #22748.

Enhancements.0: Added: Rental themes support by Real Homes.
Enhancements.1: Added: Import and export support for Properties along with related taxonomies.

Enhancements.4: Added: Iteration-based export process for handling large datasets.
Enhancements.5: Added: Import support for .json and .gz file formats.
Enhancements.6: Added: Support for importing serialized data into default WordPress custom fields.

Bug Fixes.0: Fixed: Relationship import issue for post types when dealing with parent-child relationships.

Enhancements.0: Added: Post content and featured image – Preview and test before export.

Enhancements.4: Added: Export orders based on status – Completed, Processing, On Hold, Canceled.
Enhancements.5: Added: Export customers based on the product purchased.
Enhancements.6: Added: Export customers based on user role.
Enhancements.7: Added: ACPT & ACPT Lite – Import/export support for basic fields, specialized fields, unit of measure, and media.
Enhancements.8: Enhanced: Metabox compatibility – Post reference/object field now supports 'Add New' option.
